'''"Ladle of the Leisurely Sea-Beast"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Ladle of the Leisurely Sea-Beast" is obtained from the {{Quest|Hustle and Bustle}}.
